ProjectTitle: The impact of the EU Audit Reform on the financial reporting of multinational groups.
InitialFeedbackHistory:
09/06/2023
An important resource you create is the programming scripts and word document outlining major data manipulation steps. Consider where you would publish this. Is this supplementary files to papers? It may be worth publishing this in a repository like RDR as evidence for your publications. 
RDR: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
